clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Collapse of right lower lobe lobe with volume loss.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in right lower lobe.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in right lower lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of right lower lobe.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
